channel.title: config on Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in config on Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme

item.title: Configurrrat'n
item.description: Global ship parameters On top o' Cap'n Hugo global configurat'n, th' Relearrrn theme lets ye define th' follow'n parameters 'n yer config.toml (here, values be default). Avast that some o' these parameters be explained 'n details 'n other sections o' this documentat'n. ​ params.toml # This be th' file `config/_default/params.toml`. # Ye can also store th' below opt'ns directly 'n yer `hugo.toml` but then # need t' contain them within th' `params` key.
